fullName.jp: プロンプト・アージェンタム

description.jp:
同じ高校で知り合ったことをきっかけに
ノクティスと無二の親友となる。
ルシス王家とのゆかりは無かったが 
欠かせぬ仲間として旅に同行し 
厳しい道中でたくましく成長していく。
重い運命を背負う仲間を気づかい 
ムードメーカーとして仲間との旅を
盛り立てていく。
description.gl: A close friend of Noct's since high school. Though he has no affiliation with the royal family of Lucis、 he proves an irreplaceable companion to the prince on his journey. Understanding the heavy burden placed on his comrades、 he tries to keep everyone's spirits up while on the road.

jp.text: 過去は変わらない 一生ついて回る
そりゃ 辛えでしょ
カッコイイとこいっぱい撮るからね
ぱぱぱぱーんぱーんぱーんぱんぱぱぁーん！

gl.text: I can't change where I came from、 what I am...
Yeah. You're damn right it is.
Knock 'em dead! I'll be sure to get lots of pics!
That's what a legend looks like.

desc.en: Ranged attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.gl: Ranged attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.jp: 遠距離物理攻撃\n相手のBRVを奪う攻撃

desc.en: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.gl: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.jp: 自身のBRVを消費して\n相手のHPを削る攻撃

desc.en:
Ranged BRV attack + HP attack
Target: 2 turns 20% [DEF Down]
Self: 4 turns [Life of the Party]

 While [Life of the Party] is active
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+]
　∟ Increases BRV potency by 20%
• [BRV Attack+] becomes [Overkill] when attacking target displaying Break mark
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 40%
　∟ Target: 1 turn [ATK Down]
• [HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+]
　∟ Ranged BRV attack + HP attack (BRV potency 60%)
• [HP Attack+] becomes [Crackshot] when attacking target displaying Break mark
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ BRV attack ignores Defense
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 40%
* Break mark displayed when enemy is broken or attacked while broken on previous turn
desc.gl:
Ranged BRV attack + HP attack
Target: 2 turns DEF Down I
Self: 4 turns Life of the Party
BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+, HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ while Life of the Party active

• Increases BRV gain based on Attack by 100%

 • Tremendously increased BRV based on ATK

・自身の攻撃力に依存したBRV加算量極大アップ

name.jp: ペネトレイトエクステンド

desc.en:
When using [Piercer]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 5
• Increases total BRV potency by 150%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
• [DEF Down] duration +2
• [Life of the Party]
　∟ [MAX BRV Up] effect +10%
　∟ [ATK Up] effect +30%

When using [BRV Attack+]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 2
• Increases total BRV potency by 40%

When using [Overkill]
• Increases party's BRV by 80% of Attack before BRV attacks
• BRV attack hit count becomes 4
• Increases total BRV potency by 40%
• Lowers Action Delay to 24

When using [HP Attack+]
• Increases BRV potency by 40%

When using [Crackshot]
• Increases BRV potency by 40%
• Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets
desc.gl:
When using Piercer:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 5; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
 • DEF Down duration +2
 • Slight boost to Life of the Party
 
When using BRV Attack+:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 
When using Overkill: 
 • Grants party BRV based on own ATK before BRV attack
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Turn rate+
 
When using HP Attack+, Crackshot: 
 • Moderate BRV damage boost
 
When using Crackshot: 
 • Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets

「ペネトレイト」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が5HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
